channel.title: Editorials on The Swedish Pathogens Portal
channel.description: Recent content in Editorials on The Swedish Pathogens Portal

item.title: Influenza A(H5) virus: A potential pandemic threat
item.description: A perspective on the potential for influenza viruses to be the next pandemic threat and how to be better prepared for the next pandemic.

item.title: The pandemic has paved the way for data sharing
item.description: Details the importance of sharing data, tools, and techniques in the COVID-19 pandemic and for future pandemic preparedness. Highlights how this applies to this yearâ€™s Nobel Prize in Medicine.
